attributes.action: Call for a General Election as a result of the Budget
attributes.additional_details: The breaking of the promises in the Labour manifesto is a breach of moral conduct by the government and with so many people very unhappy and feeling betrayed by this then the calling of a General Election is the only way forward.
attributes.background: Further to the details released on the 26th November on the Budget a General Election to be called as the people of the UK have been misled by the Labour government.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750050
